game.name: Demolition Cartoon Car Crash Derby
game.description:
Welcome to the extremely challenging and addictive racing challenge! Would you think that you can accept it by putting your ultimate driving skills to the test? Join Demolition Cartoon Car Crash Derby and be prepared to wear the crown of being the fastest driver of this planet! Hey! You are not alone in this tricky racing track as many experienced racers have already reached out to the playground. Choose a campaign or multiplayer and get ready to show off some insane driving abilities!

Grab your car, put your fingers on the race and head on to manage to reach as far as possible! You would surely fall in love with this brand new racing game as you find here more speed, good stability, new features, new menu, new cars and extra nitro. Your enemies are very rude, so do not show pity on them. Put your fingers on the accelerator to race and eliminate all of your deadly enemies before they do the same with you in this HTML5 car game!

Try to keep your vehicles away from other vehicles to survive for long! There are two different and engaging modes to explore and you would have 15 levels to play through in each level. Track your power by looking at the head of your character! You can also know the speed of your vehicle and at what gear it is running now by keeping your eyes on the bottom part of the screen. Challenge your enemies, perform as many stunts as you can and complete all of the derby races, and get the bonus points to become a pro racer!
